titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2011-078

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Daybook containing listings of names and dollar amounts for supplies sold from January 1936 to December 1940. Supplies sold appear to be related to coal mining and the daybook is believed to originate in Mingo County, West Virginia.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from West Virginia Daybook must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: West Virginia Daybook, Ms2011-078, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the West Virginia Daybook was completed in September 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Daybook contains listings of names and dollar amounts for supplies sold from January 1936 to December 1940. Supplies sold appear to be related to coal mining and the daybook is believed to originate in Mingo County, West Virginia.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged by material type.
